email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Soybean Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura Smith,

I hope this message finds you well. We are pleased to provide you with our initial freight quote for the transportation of 12,500MT of Soybeans from Santos to Qingdao under CFR terms. The vessel proposed for this shipment is MV OCEAN STAR, with a DWT of 75,000.

Our starting quote stands at USD 45.50 per metric ton. The vessel will be available for loading from October 10 to October 15, ensuring minimal port turnaround time.

We look forward to your feedback and are ready to finalize the arrangements at your earliest convenience.

Best Regards,
Alex Nguyen
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Soybean Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the quick response. Considering the current market conditions and the simplicity of the cargo handling for this shipment, could there be a possibility to review the rate? We believe a rate closer to USD 42.00 per metric ton would be more in line with market expectations.

Could you please consider this factor in the quote? Looking forward to a revised proposition.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Review for Soybean Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your feedback regarding the rate. After considering the current market conditions and the streamlined operations you've described, I am able to offer a revised rate of USD 43.00 per MT. This adjustment reflects the reduced handling requirement at both ports.

Please let us know if this meets your approval so we can proceed with the necessary documentation and finalize the schedule.

Warm regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Revised Freight Quote for Soybean Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hello Alex,

Appreciate the revised quote at USD 43.00 per MT. I would like to request further details on the demurrage terms and the vessel's LOA to ensure there won't be issues during berthing at Qingdao.

Also, could you confirm the laycan period remains as previously stated? A precise schedule is crucial for our operations.

Thank you,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Details & Finalization of Soybean Shipment: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your continued cooperation. I can confirm that the LOA of MV OCEAN STAR is 225m, fully compatible with the docking facilities at Qingdao. Regarding demurrage, we propose a rate of USD 8,000 per day, applicable only if there's a delay beyond the agreed laydays, which remains as October 10-15.

If these terms are acceptable, I suggest we finalize our agreement to secure the vessel for your shipment. Please let us know your decision at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Finalization of Soybean Shipment Agreement: MV OCEAN STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Everything looks good, and we accept the terms outlined, including the demurrage rate. Please proceed with the necessary paperwork. We are keen to finalize everything promptly to ensure a smooth operation of the shipment.

Thank you for all your efforts in accommodating our requests.

Best regards,
Laura Smith
